main event: An unidentified orange and flashing red light was observed by a night watchman in Minster, Ohio on 9 November 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared as a light and was brighter than bright stars.
The object made no sound and disappeared after 3 minutes.
The observer was unable to provide details on the course and duration of the object.
The observers reported the sighting to the Air Force, who requested more information on the AF Form 117.
The report suggests that the Air Force did not have sufficient information to conduct a scientific investigation.
sighted object: an orange and flashing red light
